UniprotID	P48506
Accession	P48506;Q14399
EntryName	GSH1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Glutamate--cysteine ligase catalytic subunit (EC 6.3.2.2) (GCS heavy chain) (Gamma-ECS) (Gamma-glutamylcysteine synthetase)
GeneName	GCLC GLCL GLCLC
Length	637
Function	Catalyzes the ATP-dependent ligation of L-glutamate and L-cysteine and participates in the first and rate-limiting step in glutathione biosynthesis.
Subcellular Location
